show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
My guest Jacob Azerrad, PhD offers behavioral therapy with limited punishments (time outs) and “nurturing with their... <!--more--> love sibling caring behavior, Mother Teresa behavior and, taking disappointment calmly behavior.
“  I believe in a more fundamental bonding based on unconditional love while teaching discipline through moral authority.
 A challenging, stimulating show.
